title: They should have just made it a 12A
review: The remake of it should have been made for adults to enjoy. All the gritty, dark tension that made Derry in the book the terrifying place it was is lost in this film. Not scary in the slightest, boring would be a better description.Yet another example of film makers caring too much about getting people through the door of the cinema than actually making a good film.Please stop doing this to SK books, they deserve better.
